sheet.name: Mordred
sheet.motivation: To be better than he is

qualities.name: Nothing swifter than a serpent's tongue
You can run but you can't hide
The sins of the father weigh heavy on the son

powers.name: Shadow Hide
powers.notes: You can hide unnoticed in any area of shadow big enough to hide your body. Someone with super hearing or smell will be able to make a contested roll to know that you are there.

powers.name: The Kladenets, Sword of Darkness
powers.notes: You can use the sword to cast an area of darkness. This can work in conjunction with your shadow hide.

powers.name: Blessing
powers.notes: Takes time to prepare. Target (which can be self) rolls 3d6k2 instead of 2d6 until the blessing expires. Level affects range.

powers.name: Create Ice
powers.notes: Creates ice out of moisture in the air. Effectiveness varies with the weather conditions.
